title: omg Riot IT'S NOT OUR FAULTS
body:
Riot Games pls, even you guys should know Spark Broadband is owned by a retard... Not just me but all Spark users get internet disconnections and you give us a priority queue? This is BS and i think you guys should try to understand that Spark is retarded and it is not our fault if we dc half the game... RITO PLS DO SOMETHING I AM SICK OF GETTING PRIORITY QUEUES NOW... THIS IS MY THIRD IN A ROW! Seriously you guys need to fix this game for real... so buggy and you don't even know the scenario of us and decide to throw a ban at us... RITO PLS

And also what is reportnig for? OCE HAS NO TRIBUNAL SO WHY IS THERE A REPORT BUTTON?! You can literally troll every game and won't be punished severely....

Riot Games pls get your sh** together and make something happen... until then HELLO DOTA AND SMITE

replies.body: we changed it to vodafone, and the games are a whole new level... thanks for the advice :DD

Aha, no problem. With people like you, companies like Spark are encouraged to improve the quality of their services, improving the experience for everyone.

Have fun on the field of Judd!

I agree that the report system is currently in a *dismal* state (mainly because there's no human examining the case anymore), but it's being improved behind the scenes.

Low priority queues are delivered to people who regularly leave games. This includes if you have a bad connection, because ultimately that still brings a worse experience for yourself and your team-mates. You are advised to sort out your connection issues before playing match-made games.

If Spark is as terrible an ISP as you describe, why continue using their services? If you're 100% that the fault is on their end, and that they won't agree to fix it, you should bring your business to another ISP.
